root.name: Porrasturvat - Stair dismount
root.description: Game can be found here: http://secretexit.com/freeware/stairdismountOverviewPorrasturvat - Stair Dismount, is basically just about one thing: making a person fall down stair and making them get hurt. In a similar fashion to the game Toribash, the player is presented with a white mannequin like puppet on the top of some stair. Relatively calm music is playing in the background, while the player can now choose which part of this mannequin to push. These parts include:Head Neck Gut Right Upper Arm Right Lower Arm Left Upper Arm Left Lower Arm Left Upper Leg Left Lower Leg Right Upper Leg Right Lower Leg Left Foot Right Foot The player can now decide in what angle to push the mannequin by dragging the direction of the arrow. Lastly, the power bar is continuously rising and falling. When it is at the desired force, the player presses enter to deliver the final blow. Now the mannequin falls down the stairs, while camera angles can be adjusted.Â
